block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This model is my first request from my viewers ( hopefully subscriber ). A few weeks ago I ask is there something my viewer wants to learn and a flicker or Frisbee was requested. This origami model is a Frisbee, the Penta-Flinger designed by Ed Sullivan. It is made of 5 identical modules. The original origami instructions uses a 2x3 rectangular sheet for the modules. Here I'm folding a 2x3 rectangle from a square instead. The model is really fun to make and easy to throw. I know you are sure to like it. Here is the video timeline so you could jump through the video quickly: 0:00 Introduction 0:07 Flight Demonstration 0:16 Creating a 2x3 rectangle from a square sheet 1:40 Module Folding Instructions 3:16 Penta-Flinger Assembly Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
